ComicInfo.Summary: Mindscape has captured Backlash and Dane and pits our heroes against each other in a virtual reality world until they figure out what is going on and are able to turn the tables on their foe.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brett Booth,Jeff Mariotte,Sean Ruffner,Sean Ruffner,Jeff Mariotte,Brett Booth
